@taturner Make sure you right click the torrent and update the tracker every now and then, it won't detect new seeds unless you do.

As you can see, there's alot more seeds then leechers now, I was getting 200 Kpbs when there was 60 more leechers then seeders.

This Hit worked great for me. Just copy and paste the folder in the willowgame folder. This game is GREAT. They added just enough to make it better, but the gameplay is exactly like the fisrt. Almost like just an enhanced version of the first one. I ran it for about 2 hours on my asus laptop I7 2ghz GTX560m 2gb wide open no prob at 30 frames just with physx on high. Not bragging my shit is old LOL I'm just putting out that info incase anyone is worried about hardware like I was. This shit is crazy optimized for pc. No shitty port here! Enjoy guys.

This Hit worked great for me. Just copy and paste the folder in the willowgame folder. This game is GREAT. They added just enough to make it better, but the gameplay is exactly like the fisrt. Almost like just an enhanced version of the first one.

This wors 100%. Im about 2 hours in the game and it has been smooth as hell. 30+fps and im on one of those asus gaming lappy's with an I7 and a GTX560m. good enough but no where near a powerhouse and i run it pretty much maxed and by the way, physx on HIGH is a must. Fuckin TITS!
